price: Sai Ubangijinsa Ya karɓa masa sabõda haka Ya karkatar da kaidinsu daga gare shi. Lalle Shĩ ne Mai jĩ, Masani.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ فَصَرَفَ عَنۡهُ كَيۡدَهُنَّۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajāba lahu rabbuhu faṣarafa ʿanhu kaydahunna innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
